text: aldhyn yuzahrwn minkum min nsayhm, fayaqul alrajul minhum lzwjth: "ant ely kzhr amy" -ay fi hurmat alnkah- qad easau allah wkhalfu alshre, wnsawhm lasn fi alhaqiqat amhathm, 'iinama huna zwjathm, ma 'umahatuhum 'iilaa allaayiy wldnhm. wa'iin hwla' almzahiryn layaqulun qawlana kadhbana fzyeana la tuerf shth. wa'iina allah laeafuun ghafur emman sadar minh bed almkhalfat, ftdarkha baltwbt alnswh
